Name: LU 859 - Zoning, 270 Nostrand Avenue, Brooklyn (C 20210151 ZMK)
Title: Resolution approving with modifications the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 210151 ZMK, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 859).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}}
{\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;}
\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tx720\tab WHEREAS, BRP East Brooklyn Development, LLC, \expndtw-6 filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 17a, changing from an existing R7A District to an R8A District and establishing within a proposed R8A District a C2-4 District, which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate the development of a new 14-story mixed-use building with approximately 487 dwelling units, 144 of which would be permanently affordable, along with ground floor commercial and community facility uses at 270 Nostrand Avenue (Block 1788, Lots 55 and p/o 49) in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn, Community District 3 (ULURP No. C 210151 ZMK) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on September 10, 2021 its decision dated September 1, 2021 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N \cf1 210152 \cf0 ZRK (L.U. No. 860), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7560\tx7920\tx8640\tx8933\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on September 24, 2021;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Revised Negative Declaration issued August 27\super th\nosupersub , 2021, which supersedes the Negative Declaration issued April 5\super th\nosupersub , 2021, and Revised Environmental Assessment Statement issued August 27\super th\nosupersub , 2021 (CEQR No. 21DCP043K) which include an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to air quality and noise (E-606) (the \ldblquote Revised Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:  \par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-606) and Revised Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 210151 ZMK, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission with the following modifications:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\cf1 Matter double struck out is old, deleted by the City Council; \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\cf0 Matter \uldb double-underlined\ulnone  is new, added by the City Council\fs28\par
\pard\ltrpar\fs24\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 17a: \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\sa160\qj 1.\tab changing from an R7A District to an R7D District property bounded by a line midway between DeKalb Avenue and Kosciusko Street, a line 100 feet westerly of Nostrand Avenue, Kosciusko Street, and a line 240 feet westerly of Nostrand Avenue; \par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\sa160\qj 2.\tab changing from an R7A District to an R7X District property bounded by DeKalb Avenue, Nostrand Avenue, Kosciuszko Street, a line 100 feet westerly of Nostrand Avenue, a line midway between DeKalb Avenue and Kosciuszko Street, and a line 240 feet westerly of Nostrand Avenue; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\tx810 3.\tab establishing within the proposed R7X District a C2-4 District bounded by DeKalb Avenue, Nostrand Avenue, Kosciuszko Street, a line 100 feet westerly of Nostrand Avenue, a line midway between DeKalb Avenue and Kosciuszko Street, and a line 240 feet westerly of Nostrand Avenue;\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\sa160\qj\uldb 1.\tab changing from an R7A District to an R8A District property bounded by Dekalb Avenue, Nostrand Avenue, Kosciuszko Street, and a line 240 feet westerly of Nostrand Avenue; and\fs28\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\tx810\fs24 2.\tab establishing within the proposed R8A District a C2-4 District bounded by Dekalb Avenue, Nostrand Avenue, Kosciuszko Street, a line 100 feet westerly of Nostrand Avenue, a line midway between Dekalb Avenue and Kosciusko Street, and a line 240 feet westerly of Nostrand Avenue;\fs28\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ulnone\fs24\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated April 5, 2021, and subject to the conditions of City Environmental Quality Review (CEQR) Declaration E-606, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 3.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on November 10, 2021, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
\par
\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qr .....................................................\par
City Clerk, Clerk of The Council \par
